categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Phoedris Bos was a male Nalrithian sympathizer who served the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War.

Early in his life, his eggmate Cypher Bos killed his weaker siblings but avoided Phoedris because he was stronger then the others. He was killed by Cypher on Ord Mantell who then proceeded to use Phoedris' identity as a cover during his bounty hunting work.
